entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
